GK19asvsaunu:1: CANTO I gautamaḥ kapilo nāma muni dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2: babhūva tapasi śrāntaḥ kākṣīvān iva gautamaḥ // Saund_1.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:3: aśiśriyad yaḥ satataṃ dīptaṃ kāśyapavat tapaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:4: āśiśrāya ca tadvṛddhau siddhim kāśyapavat parām // Saund_1.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:5: haviḥṣu yaś ca svātmārthaṃ gām adhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:6: tapaḥśiṣṭeṣu ca śiṣyeṣu gām adhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:7: māhātmyād dīrghatapaso yo dvitīya ivābhavat // Saund_1.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:8: tṛtīya iva yaś cābhūt kāyāṅgirasayor dhiyā // Saund_1.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:10: kṣetraṃ cāyatanaṃ caiva tapasām āśramo 'bhavat // Saund_1.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:16: bandhumān iva yas tasthau sarobhiḥ sasaraoruhaiḥ // Saund_1.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:18: śuśubhe vavṛdhe caiva naraḥ sādhanavān iva // Saund_1.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:22: tīrthānāṃ cābhiṣekeṣu śuśruve yatra nisvanaḥ // Saund_1.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:23: virejur hariṇā yatra suptā medhyāsu vediṣu /
GK19asvsaunu:24: salājair mādhavīpuṣpair upahārāḥ kṛtā iva // Saund_1.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:25: api kṣudramṛgā yatra sāntāś ceruḥ samaṃ mṛgaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:26: śarañyebhyas tapasvibhyo vinayaṅ śikṣitā iva // Saund_1.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:28: pratyakṣiṇa ivākurvaṃs tapo yatra tapodhanāḥ // Saund_1.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:29: yatra sma mīyate brahma kaiś cit kaiś cin na mīyate /
GK19asvsaunu:30: kāle nimīyate somo na cākāle pramīyate // Saund_1.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:32: saṃhṛṣṭā iva yatnena tāpasās te pire tapaḥ // Saund_1.16
GK19asvsaunu:34: taporāgeṇa dharmasya vilopam iva cakrire // Saund_1.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:36: kecid ikṣvākavo jagmū rājaputrā vivatsavaḥ // Saund_1.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:38: pātraṃ śabdasya mahataḥ śriyāṃ ca vinayasya ca // Saund_1.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:41: mātṛśulkād upagatāṃ te śriyaṃ na viṣehire /
GK19asvsaunu:42: rarakṣuś ca pituḥ kautsās te bhavanti sma gautamāḥ // Saund_1.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:44: rāma evābhavad gārgyo vāsubhadro 'pi gautamaḥ // Saund_1.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:46: tasmād ikṣvākuvaṃśyās te bhuvi śākya iti smṛtāḥ // Saund_1.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:47: sa teṣāṃ gautamaś cakre svavaṃśasadṛśīḥ kriyāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:48: munir ūrdhvaṃ kumārasya sagarasyeva bhārgavaḥ // Saund_1.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:50: vālmīkir iva dhīmāṃś ca dhīmator maithileyayoḥ // Saund_1.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:51: tadvanaṃ muninā tena taiś ca kṣatriyapuṅgavaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:52: śāntāṃ guptāṃ ca yugapad brahmakṣatraśriyaṃ dadhe // Saund_1.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:54: muniḥ sa viyad utpatya tān uvāca nṛpātmajān // Saund_1.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:55: yā patet kalaśād asmād akṣayyasalilān mahīm /
GK19asvsaunu:56: dhārā tām anatikramya mām anveta yathākramam // Saund_1.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:57: tataḥ paramam ity uktvā śirobhiḥ praṇipatya ca /
GK19asvsaunu:58: rathān āruruhuḥ sarve śīghravāhān alaṅkrṛtān // Saund_1.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:59: tataḥ sa tair anugataḥ syandanasthair nabhogataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:62: tān uvāca muniḥ sthitvā bhūmipālasutān idam // Saund_1.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:64: nirmimīdhvaṃ puraṃ yūyaṃ mayi yāte triviṣṭapam // Saund_1.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:65: tataḥ kadācit te vīrās tasmin pratigate munau /
GK19asvsaunu:66: babhramur yauvanoddāmā gajā iva niraṅkuśāḥ // Saund_1.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:71: tān dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiṃ yātān vṛddhān vyāghraśiśūn iva /
GK19asvsaunu:72: tāpasās tadvanarh hitvā himavantarh siṣevire // Saund_1.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:74: paśyanto tadāśramasthānarṃ śūnyaṃ taiḥ niśaśvasuḥ // Saund_1.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:76: tatra tajjñair upākhyātān avāpur mahato nidhīn // Saund_1.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:78: nidhayo naikavidhayo bhūrayas te gatārayaḥ // Saund_1.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:79: tatas tatpratilambhāc ca pariṇāmāc ca karmaṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:80: tasmin vāstuni vāstujñāḥ puraṃ śrīman nyaveśayan // Saund_1.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:86: śāntaye vṛddhaye caiva yatra viprān ajītjapan // Saund_1.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:88: yatra svena prabhāvena bhṛtyadaṇḍān ajītjapan // Saund_1.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:90: arhato 'tiṣṭhipan yatra śūrān dakṣān kuṭumbinaḥ // Saund_1.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:91: vyastais tais tair guñair yuktān mativāgvikramādibhiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:92: karmasu patirūpeṣu saicāṃs tān nyayūyujan // Saund_1.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:94: yad babhāse naraiḥ kīrṇaṃ mandaraḥ kinnarair iva // Saund_1.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:98: nājñāyā cetanotkarṣād dikṣu sarvāsv acīkhanan // Saund_1.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:100: sabhāḥ kūpavatīś caiva samantāt pratyatiṣṭhipan // Saund_1.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:104: niketam iva vidyānāṃ saṃketam iva saṃpadām // Saund_1.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:107: samājair utsavair dāyaiḥ kriyāvidhibhir eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:108: alañcakrur alaṃvīryās te jagaddhāma tatpuram // Saund_1.55 //
GK19asvsaunu:109: yasmād anyāyatas te ca kaṃ cin nācīkaran karam /
GK19asvsaunu:110: tasmād alpena kālena tat tadāpūpuran puram // Saund_1.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:112: yasmāt te tatpuraṃ cakrus tasmāt kapilavāstu tat // Saund_1.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:114: puryo yathā hi śrūyante tathaiva kapilasya tat // Saund_1.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:115: āpuḥ puraṃ tatpuruhūtakalpās te tejasāryeṇa na vismayena /
GK19asvsaunu:116: āpur yaśogandham ataś ca śaśvat sutā yayāter iva kīrtimantaḥ // Saund_1.59
GK19asvsaunu:117: tannāthavṛttair api rājaputrair arājakaṃ naiva rarāja rāṣṭram /
GK19asvsaunu:118: tārāsahasrair api dīpyamānair anutthite candra ivāntarīkṣam // Saund_1.60
GK19asvsaunu:119: yo jyāyān atha vayasā guṇaiś ca teṣāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ vṛṣabha ivaujasā vṛṣāṇām /
GK19asvsaunu:120: te tatra priyaguruvas tam abhyaṣiñcann ādityā daśaśatalocanaṃ divīva //
GK19asvsaunu:121: ācāravān vinayavān nayavān kriyāvān dharmāya nendriyadukhāya dhṛtātparaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:122: tadbhrātṛbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa jugopa rāṣṭraṃ saṃkrandano divam ivānuṣrto marudbhiḥ // Saund_1.62
GK19asvsaunu:123: Saundaranada mahākāvye kapilavāstuvarṇano nāma prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:124: CANTO II tataḥ kadā cit kālena tad avāpa kulakramāt /
GK19asvsaunu:125: rāja śuddhodhano nāma śuddhakarmā jitendriyaḥ // Saund_2.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:126: yaḥ sasañje na kāmeṣu śrīpāptau na visismiye /
GK19asvsaunu:127: nāvamene parānṛddhyā parebhyo nāpi vivyathe // Saund_2.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:129: vikrānto nayvāṃś caiva dhīraḥ sumukha eva ca // Saund_2.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:130: vapuṣmāṃś ca na ca stabdho dakṣiṇo na ca nārajavaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:131: tejasvī na ca na kṣāntaḥ kartā ca na ca vismitaḥ // Saund_2.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:132: ākṣiptaḥ śatrubhiḥ saṃkhye suhṛdbhiś ca vyapāśritaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:133: abhavad yo na vimukhas tejasā ditsayaiva ca // Saund_2.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:134: yaḥ pūrvai rājabhir yātāṃ yiyāsur dharmapaddhatim /
GK19asvsaunu:135: rājyaṃ dīkṣām iva vahan vṛttetānvagamat pitṝn // Saund_2.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:136: yasya suvyahārāc ca rakṣanāc ca sukhaṃ prajāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:137: śiśyire vigatodvegāḥ pitur aṅkagatā iva // Saund_2.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:138: kṛtaśāstraḥ kṛtāstro vā jāto vā vipule kule /
GK19asvsaunu:139: akṛtārtho na dadṛśe yasya darśanameyivān // Saund_2.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:140: hitaṃ vipriyam apy ukto yaḥ śuśrāva na cukṣubhe /
GK19asvsaunu:141: duṣkṛtaṃ bahv api tyaktvā sasmāra kṛtam aṇv api // Saund_2.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:145: arjayanto dadṛśire dhanānīva guṇān api // Saund_2.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:146: adhyaiṣṭa yaḥ paraṃ brahma na vyaiṣṭa satataṃ dhṛteḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:147: dānān yadita pātrebhyaḥ pāpaṃ nākṛta kiṃ cana // Saund_2.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:149: na hy avānchīc eyutaḥ satyān muhūrtam api jīvitam // Saund_2.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:151: vyarociṣta ca śiṣṭebhyo māsīṣe candramā iva // Saund_2.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:152: avedīd buddhiśāstrābhyām iha cāmutra ca kṣamam /
GK19asvsaunu:153: arakṣīd dhairyavīryābhyām indriyāṇy api ca prajāḥ // Saund_2.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:154: ahārṣīd duḥkham ārtānāṃ dviṣatāṃ corjitaṃ yaśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:155: acaiṣte ca nayair bhūmiṃ bhūyasā yaśasaiva ca // Saund_2.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:156: apy āsīd duḥkhitān paśyan prakṛtyā karuṇātmakaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:157: nāhauṣte ca yaśo lobhād anyāyādhigatair dhanaiḥ // Saund_2.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:159: nādidāsīdaditsīt tu saumukhvāt svaṃ svam arthavat // Saund_2.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:160: anivedyāgram arhadbhyo nālikṣat hiṃ cid aplutaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:161: gām adharmeṇa nādhukṣat kṣīratarṣeṇa gām iva // Saund_2.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:162: nāsṛkṣad balim aprāptaṃ nārukṣan mānam aiśvaram /
GK19asvsaunu:163: āgamair buddhim āhikṣad dharmāya na tu kīrtaye // Saund_2.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:164: kleśārhān api kāṃś ci tu nākliṣṭa kliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:165: āryabhāvāc ca nāghukṣad dviṣato 'pi sato guṇān // Saund_2.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:166: ākṛṣad vapuṣā dṛṣṭīḥ prajānāṃ candramā iva /
GK19asvsaunu:167: parasvaṃ bhuvi nāmṛkṣan mahāviṣam ivoragam // Saund_2.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:168: nākrukṣad viṣaye tasya kaś cit kaiś cit kva cit kṣataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:169: adikṣat tasya hastastham ārtebhyo hy abhayaṃ dhanuḥ // Saund_2.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:171: adarśat snighayā dṛṣṭyā ślakṣṇena vacasāsicat // Saund_2.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:173: adarśat kārtayuge dharme dharmāt kṛcchre 'pi nāsrasat // Saund_2.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:175: avartiṣṭa ca vṛddheṣu nāvṛtad garhite pathi // Saund_2.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:176: śarair aśīśam acchatrūn guṇair bandhūn arīramat /
GK19asvsaunu:177: randhrair nācūcudad bhṛtyān karair nāpīpiḍat prajāḥ // Saund_2.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:178: rakṣaṇāc caiva śauryāc ca nikhilāṃ gām avīvapat /
GK19asvsaunu:179: spaṣṭayā daṇḍanītyā ca rātrisattrān avīvapat // Saund_2.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:181: dīptyā tama ivādityas tejasārīn avīvapat // Saund_2.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:185: rājadharmasthiatvāc ca kāle sasyam asūṣavat // Saund_2.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:188: rāṣṭram anyatra ca baler na sa kiṅ cid dadīdapat /
GK19asvsaunu:189: bhṛtyair eva ca sodyogaṃ dviṣaddarpam adīdapat // Saund_2.33 /
GK19asvsaunu:190: svair evādīdapac cāpi bhūyo bhūyo guṇaiḥ kulam /
GK19asvsaunu:193: pālanāc ca cvijān brahma nirduvignān amīmapat // Saund_2.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:195: tapasā tejasā caiva dviṣatsainyam amīmapat // Saund_2.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:197: darśanāc caiva dharmasya kāle svargam avīvasat // Saund_2.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:199: priya ity eva cāśaktaṃ na saṃrāgād avīvṛdhat // Saund_2.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:200: tejasā ca tviṣā caiva ripūn dṛptān abhībhasat /
GK19asvsaunu:201: yaśodīpena dīptena pṛthivīṃ ca vyabhībhasat // Saund_2.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:203: dravyaṃ mahad api tyaktvā na caivākīrti kiṃ cana // Saund_2.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:205: jitvā dṛptān api ripūn na tenākāri vismayaḥ // Saund_2.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:206: na tenābhedi māryādā kāmād dveṣād bhayād api /
GK19asvsaunu:207: tena satsv api bhogeṣu nāsevīndriyavṛttitā // Saund_2.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:208: na tenārdarśi viṣamaṃ kāryaṅ kva cana kiṃ cana /
GK19asvsaunu:209: vipriyapriyayoḥ kṛtye na tenāgāmi nikriyāḥ // Saund_2.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:210: tenāpāyi yathākalpaṃ somaś ca yaśa eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:211: vedaś cāmnāyi satataṃ vedokto dharma eva ca // Saund_2.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:214: atha tasmin tathā kāle dharmakāmā divaukasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:215: vicerur diśi lokasya dharmacaryā didṛkṣavaḥ // Saund_2.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:217: dadṛśus taṃ viśeṣeṇa dharmātmānaṃ narādhipam // Saund_2.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:219: upapattiṃ praṇidadhe kule tasya mahīpateḥ // Saund_2.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:220: tasya devī nṛdevasya māyā nāma tadābhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:222: svapne 'tha samaye garbham āviśantaṃ dadarśa sā /
GK19asvsaunu:223: ṣaḍdantaṃ vāraṇaṃ śvetam airāvatam ivaujasā // Saund_2.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:224: taṃ vinirdidiṣuḥ śrutvā svapnaṃ svapnavido dvijāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:230: divi dundubhayo nedur dīvyatāṃ marutām iva /
GK19asvsaunu:231: didīpe 'bhyadhiaṃ sūryaḥ śivaś ca pavano vavau // Saund_2.54 //
GK19asvsaunu:232: tutuṣus tuṣitāś caiva śuddhāvāsāś ca devatāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:235: babhrāje śāntayā lakṣmyā dharmo vigrahavān iva // Saund_2.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:236: devyām api yavīyasyām araṇyām iva pāvakaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:237: nando nāma suto jajñe nityānandakaraḥ kule // Saund_2.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:239: vapuṣāgryeṇa yo nāma sundaropapadaṃ dadhe // Saund_2.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:240: madhumāsa iva prāptaś candro naa ivoditaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:241: aṅgavān iva cānaṅgaḥ sa babhau kāntayā śriyā // Saund_2.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:242: sa tau saṃvardhayāmāsa narendraḥ parayā mudā /
GK19asvsaunu:243: arthaḥ sajjanahastastho dharmakāmau mahān iva // Saund_2.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:244: tasya kālena satputrau vavṛdhāte bhavāya tau /
GK19asvsaunu:246: tayoḥ satputrayor madhye śākyarājo rarāja saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:248: tatas tayoḥ saṃskṛtayoḥ krameṇa narendrasūnvoḥ kṛtavidyayoś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:249: kāmeṣv ajasraṅ pramamāda nandaḥ sarvārthasiddhas tu na saṃrarañja //
GK19asvsaunu:250: sa prekśyaiva hi jīrṇam āturaṅ ca mṛtaṅ ca vimṛśan jagadanbhijñam ārtacittaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:251: hṛdayagataparaghṛṇo na viṣayaratim agamaj jananamaraṇabhayam abhito vijighāṃsuḥ // Saund_2.64
GK19asvsaunu:252: udvegād apunarbhave manaḥ praṇidhāya sa yayau śayitavarāṅganādanāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:253: niśi nṛpatinilayanād vanagamankṛtmanāḥ sarasa iva mathitanalināt kalahaṃsaḥ // Saund_2.65
GK19asvsaunu:254: Saundaranande mahākāvye rājavarṇano nāma dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:255: CANTO III tapase tataḥ kapilavāstu hayagarathaughasaṃkulam /
GK19asvsaunu:256: śrīmad abhayam anuraktajanaṃ sa vihāya viścitamanā vanaṃ yayau //
GK19asvsaunu:257: vividhāgmāṃs tapasi tāṃś ca vividhaniyamāśrayān munīn /
GK19asvsaunu:258: prekṣya sa viṣayatṛākṛpaṇān anavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata // Saund_3.2
GK19asvsaunu:260: tattvakṛtamatir upāsya jahāvayam apy amārga iti māgakovidaḥ // Saund_3.3
GK19asvsaunu:261: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramam iti taṃ tam āgamam /
GK19asvsaunu:262: niścayam anadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram // Saund_3.4
GK19asvsaunu:263: atha naiṣa mārga iti vikṣya tad api vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:264: dhyānaviṣayam avagamya paraṃ bubhuje varānnam amṛtatvabuddhaye //
GK19asvsaunu:266: plakṣam avaniruham abhyagamat paramasya niścayavidher bubhutsayā //
GK19asvsaunu:268: mārabalam ajayad ugram atho bubudhe padaṃ śivam ahāryam avyayam //
GK19asvsaunu:269: avagamya taṃ ca kṛtakāryam amṛtamanaso divaukasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:270: harṣam atulam agaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe //
GK19asvsaunu:271: sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicāla hutavahasakaḥ śivo vavau /
GK19asvsaunu:272: nedur api ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:273: avabudhya caiva paramārtham ajaram anukampayā vibhuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:274: nityam amṛtam upadarśyituṃ sa varāñasīparikarām ayāt purīm // Saund_3.10
GK19asvsaunu:276: tatra vinayanimāram ṛṣir jagato hitāya pariṣady avartayat // Saund_3.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:277: iti duḥkham etad iyam asya samudayalatā pravartikā /
GK19asvsaunu:278: śāntir iyam ayam upāya iti pravibhāgaśaḥ param idaṃ catuṣṭayam //
GK19asvsaunu:279: abhidhāya ca triparivartam atulam anivartyam uttamam /
GK19asvsaunu:280: dvādaśaniyatavikalpam ṛṣir vinināya kauṇḍinasagotram āditaḥ // Saund_3.13
GK19asvsaunu:281: sa hi doṣasāgaram agādham upadhijalam ādhijanutkam /
GK19asvsaunu:282: krodhamadabhayatarṅgacalaṃ pratatāra lokam api vyatārayat // Saund_3.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:283: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanam atho girivraje /
GK19asvsaunu:284: pitryam api paramakāruṇiko nagaraṃ yayāv anujighṛkṣayā tadā // Saund_3.15
GK19asvsaunu:286: sūryasadṛśavapur abhyudito vijahāra sūrya iva gautamas tamaḥ // Saund_3.16
GK19asvsaunu:288: vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam //
GK19asvsaunu:289: aparigrahaḥ sa hi babhūva niyatamatir ātmanīśvaraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:291: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucam avajñayāgamat /
GK19asvsaunu:292: niścitamatir asicandanayor na jagāma duḥkhasukhayoś ca vikriyām //
GK19asvsaunu:293: atha pārthivaḥ samupalabhya sutam upagataṃ tathāgatam /
GK19asvsaunu:295: sugatas tathāgatam avekṣya narapatim adhīram āśayā /
GK19asvsaunu:296: śeṣam api ca janam aśrumukhaṃ vinīṣaya gaganam utpapāta ha // Saund_3.21
GK19asvsaunu:297: sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punar upaviveśa tasthivān /
GK19asvsaunu:298: niścalamatir aśayiṣṭa punar bahudhābhavat punar abhūt tathaikadhā //
GK19asvsaunu:299: salile kṣitāv iva cacāra jalam iva viveṣa medinīm /
GK19asvsaunu:300: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punar ajvalan nava ivodito raviḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:301: yugapaj jvalan jvalanavac ca jalam avasṛhaṃś ca meghavat /
GK19asvsaunu:302: taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:304: prītim agamad atulāṃ nṛpatir janatā natāś ca bahumānam abhyayuḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:306: paurajanam api ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:307: nṛpatis tataḥ prathamam āpa phalam amṛtadharmasiddhayoḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:308: dharmam atulam adhigamya muner munaye nanāma sa yato gurāv iva //
GK19asvsaunu:311: vijahus tu ye 'pi na gṛhāṇi tanayapitṛmātrapekṣayā /
GK19asvsaunu:312: te 'pi niyamavidhimāmaraṇāj jagṛhuś ca yuktamanasaś ca daghrire //
GK19asvsaunu:313: na jihiṃsa sūkṣmam api jantum api paravadhopajīvanaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:314: kiṃ bata vipulaguñaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu muner upāsayā // Saund_3.30
GK19asvsaunu:316: nānyadhanam apajahāra tathā bhujagād ivānyavibhavād dhi vivyathe //
GK19asvsaunu:318: naiva ca parayuvatīr agamat paramaṃ hi tā dhanato 'py amanyata //
GK19asvsaunu:319: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaś cid ṛtam api jajalpa nāpriyam /
GK19asvsaunu:320: ślakṣṇam api ca na jagāv ahitaṃ hitam apy uvāca na ca paiśunāya yat //
GK19asvsaunu:321: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:322: kāmasukham asukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:323: na parasya kaś cid apaghātam api ca sgṛṇo vyacintayat /
GK19asvsaunu:324: mātṛpiṛsutasuhṛsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi paras paraṃ janaḥ // Saund_3.35
GK19asvsaunu:325: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavad api ca bhūtam apy atho /
GK19asvsaunu:326: karmaphalam api ca lokagatir niyateti darśanam avāpa sādhu ca //
GK19asvsaunu:328: bhraṃśini śitahilaguṇo 'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munsaṃśrayaj janaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:329: na ca tatra kaś cid upapattisukham abhilalāṣa tair guṇaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:330: sarvam aśivam avagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane //
GK19asvsaunu:332: srotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasas tanutvam api cakrire pare // Saund_3.39
GK19asvsaunu:333: vavṛte 'tra yo 'pi viṣameṣu vibhavadṛśeṣu kaś cana /
GK19asvsaunu:334: tyāgavinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so 'pi na cacāla satpathāt // Saund_3.40
GK19asvsaunu:335: api ca svato 'pi parato 'pi na bhayam abhavan na daivataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:336: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇair jahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manor iva //
GK19asvsaunu:337: iti muditam anāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupurupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat /
GK19asvsaunu:338: abhavad abhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge //
GK19asvsaunu:339: CANTO IV munau bruvāñe 'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu /
GK19asvsaunu:340: prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ // Saund_4.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:341: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākas tayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:342: nācintayad vaiśrmaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tasthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam //
GK19asvsaunu:343: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti /
GK19asvsaunu:344: dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yato babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā // Saund_4.3
GK19asvsaunu:346: bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa // Saund_4.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:348: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ // Saund_4.5
GK19asvsaunu:349: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaś ca nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:350: atītya martyān anupetya devān sṛṣṭāv abhūtām iva bhūtadhātrā // Saund_4.6
GK19asvsaunu:351: tāṃ sundarīṃ cen na labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:352: dvandaṃ dhruvaṃ tad vikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāv iva rātricandrau //
GK19asvsaunu:353: kandarparatyor iva lakṣyabhūtaṃ pramodanāndyor iva nīḍabhūtam /
GK19asvsaunu:354: praharṣatuṣṭyor iva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam //
GK19asvsaunu:356: parasparāśleṣahṛtāṇgarāgaṃ parasparaṃ tan mithunaṃ jahāra // Saund_4.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:358: cikrīḍatuś cābhivirejatuś ca rūpaśriyānyonyam ivākṣipantau // Saund_4.10
GK19asvsaunu:359: anyonyasaṃrāgavivardhanena tad dvandvam anyonyam arīramac ca /
GK19asvsaunu:360: klamāntare 'nyonyavinodanena salīlam anyonyam amīmadac ca // Saund_4.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:361: vibhūṣayām āsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣus tāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham /
GK19asvsaunu:362: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānām api bhuṣaṇaṃ sā // Saund_4.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:363: dattvātha sā darpaṇam asya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvad enam /
GK19asvsaunu:364: viśeṣakaṃ yāvad ahaṃ karomīty uvāca kāntaṃ sa ca taṃ babhāra // Saund_4.13
GK19asvsaunu:365: bhartus tataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṅ sāpi cakāra tādṛk /
GK19asvsaunu:366: niśvāsavātena ca darpañasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ // Saund_4.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:367: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa /
GK19asvsaunu:368: bhavec ca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra //
GK19asvsaunu:369: cikṣepa karṇotpalam asya cāṃse kareña savyena madālasena /
GK19asvsaunu:370: pattrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre 'sya tām eva vinirdudhāva //
GK19asvsaunu:372: padhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopamābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayān nāma nanāma nadaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:373: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse /
GK19asvsaunu:374: suvarṇavedyām anilāvabhagnaḥ puṣpātibhārād iva nāgavṛkṣaḥ // Saund_4.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:375: sā taṃ stanodvartitahāraṣṭir utthāpayām āsa nipīḍya dorbhyām /
GK19asvsaunu:376: kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti jahāsa coccair mukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena // Saund_4.19
GK19asvsaunu:377: patyus tato darpaṇasaktapāṇer muhurmuhur vaktram avekṣamāṇā /
GK19asvsaunu:378: tamālapattrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_4.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:379: tasyā mukhaṅ tat satamālapattraṅ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:380: raktādhikāgraṃ patitadvirephaṅ saśaivalaṅ padmam ivābabhāse // Saund_4.21
GK19asvsaunu:381: nandas tato darpaṇam ādareṇa bibhrat tadāmaṇḍanasākṣibhūtam /
GK19asvsaunu:382: viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa // Saund_4.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:384: nandaḥ priyāyā mukham īkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva // Saund_4.23
GK19asvsaunu:385: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatas tathā caiva nandana nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:386: tathāgataś cāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveṣa veśma // Saund_4.24
GK19asvsaunu:387: avāṅmukho niṣpraṇayaś ca tasthau bhrātu gṛhe 'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva /
GK19asvsaunu:388: tasmād atho preṣyajanapramādād bhikṣām alabdhaiva punar jagāma //
GK19asvsaunu:389: kā cit pipeṣāṅgavilepanaṃ hi vāso 'ṅganā kā cid avāsayac ca /
GK19asvsaunu:390: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthur anyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaś ca //
GK19asvsaunu:391: tasmin gṛhe bhartur ataś carantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam /
GK19asvsaunu:392: kāś cin na buddhaṃ dadṛśur yuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṅ manīṣā //
GK19asvsaunu:393: kā cit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:394: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhād iva dīptam arkam // Saund_4.28
GK19asvsaunu:395: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:396: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣus tadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe // Saund_4.29
GK19asvsaunu:397: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gurur gṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:398: bhikṣām alabdhvā giram āsanaṃ vā sūnyād araṇyād iva yāti bhūyaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:399: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥprayāṇam /
GK19asvsaunu:400: cacāla citrābharaṇāmbarasrak kalpadrumo dhūta ivānilena // Saund_4.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:401: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce /
GK19asvsaunu:402: kartuṃ gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ mām abhyanujñātum ihārhasīti // Saund_4.32
GK19asvsaunu:403: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva /
GK19asvsaunu:404: dadarśa cāśuplutalolanetrā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasya vaco 'bhyuvāca //
GK19asvsaunu:405: nāhaṃ yiyāsor gurudarśanārtham arhāmi kartuṃ tava dharmapīḍām /
GK19asvsaunu:406: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghram eva viśeṣako yāvad ayaṅ na śuṣkaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:407: saced bhaves tvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇdaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam /
GK19asvsaunu:408: muhurmuhus tvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam //
GK19asvsaunu:409: athāpy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayy eṣyasi tvaṃ tvaritaṃ tatas tvām /
GK19asvsaunu:411: ity evam uktaś ca nipīḍitaś ca tayāsavarṇasvanayā jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:412: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gurur dūragato na me saḥ // Saund_4.37
GK19asvsaunu:413: tataḥ stanodvartitacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena /
GK19asvsaunu:414: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapur babhāra // Saund_4.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:415: sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī /
GK19asvsaunu:416: sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntasṃ mṛgaṃ bhrāntaṃ mṛgaṅ bhrāntaṃ mukhī mṛgīva // Saund_4.39
GK19asvsaunu:417: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munes tu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca /
GK19asvsaunu:418: vivṛttadṛṣṭiś ca śanair yayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareñum //
GK19asvsaunu:419: chātodariṃ pīnapayodharoruṃ sa sundarīṃ rukmadarīm ivādreḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:420: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibann ivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa //
GK19asvsaunu:421: taṅ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punar ācakarṣa /
GK19asvsaunu:422: sa 'niścayān nāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃs taraṅgeṣv iva rājahaṃsaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:423: adarśanaṃ tūpagataś ca tasyā harmyāt tataś cāvatatāra tūrṇam /
GK19asvsaunu:424: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punar lalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ // Saund_4.43
GK19asvsaunu:425: sa kāmarāgeña nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeña ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:426: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratisrota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_4.44
GK19asvsaunu:427: tataḥ kramair dīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kataṃ nu yāto na gurur bhaved iti /
GK19asvsaunu:428: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyām ārdraviśeṣakām iti //
GK19asvsaunu:429: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare 'pi tathāgatābhimānam /
GK19asvsaunu:430: daśabalam abhito vilambamānaṃ dhvajam anuyāna ivaindram arcyamānam //
GK19asvsaunu:431: Saundaranande mahākāvye bhāryāyācitako nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:432: CANTO V athāvatīryāśvarathadvipebhyaḥ śākyā yathāsvarddhi gṛhītaveṣāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:433: mahāpaṇebhyo vyavahāriṇaś ca mahāmunau bhaktivaśāt praṇemuḥ // Saund_5.1
GK19asvsaunu:434: ke cit praṇamyānuyayur mhūrtaṅ ke cit praṇamyārthavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:435: ke cit svakeṣv āvastheṣu tastuḥ kṛtvāñjalīn vikṣaṇatatparākṣāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:436: buddhas tatas tatra narendramārga sroto mahadbhaktimato janasya /
GK19asvsaunu:437: jagāma duūkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame srota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_5.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:438: atho mahadbhiḥ pathi saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya /
GK19asvsaunu:439: kartuṃ prañāmaṃ na śaśāka nandas tenābhireme tu guror mahimnā // Saund_5.4
GK19asvsaunu:440: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣur bhaktiṃ janasyānyamateś ca rakṣan /
GK19asvsaunu:441: nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato 'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede //
GK19asvsaunu:442: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgam abhipratasthe /
GK19asvsaunu:443: gatvāgrataś cāgryatamāya tasmai nāndīvimuktāya nanāma nadnaḥ // Saund_5.6
GK19asvsaunu:444: śanair vrjann eva sa gauraveṇa paṭāvṛtāṃso vinatārdhakāyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:445: adhonibaddhāñjalir ūrdhvanetraḥ sagadgadaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe //
GK19asvsaunu:447: atas tvarāvān aham abhyupeto gṛhasya kakṣyāmahato 'bhasūyan // Saund_5.8
GK19asvsaunu:448: tat sādhu sādhupriya matpriyārthaṃ tatrāstu bikṣūttama bhaikṣakālsaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:449: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ // Saund_5.9
GK19asvsaunu:450: ity evam uktaḥ praṇatena tena snehābhimānonmukhalocanena /
GK19asvsaunu:451: tādṛṅnimittaṃ sugataś cakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda // Saund_5.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:452: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsaunu:453: anugrahārthaṃ sugatas tu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puṣkarapattranetraḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:454: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram /
GK19asvsaunu:456: parāṅmukhas tv anyamanaskam ārād vijñāya nandaḥ sugataṃ gatāstham /
GK19asvsaunu:457: hastasthapātro 'pi gṛha yiyāsuḥ sasāra mārgān munim īkṣamāṇaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:458: bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvāpi yiyāsur eva /
GK19asvsaunu:459: vimohayām āsa munis tatas taṃ rathyāmukhasyāvaraṇena tasya // Saund_5.14
GK19asvsaunu:460: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñanaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaś ca tīvram /
GK19asvsaunu:461: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṅ ca nandaṃ yatas taṃ munir ācakarṣa // Saund_5.15
GK19asvsaunu:462: saṃkleśapakṣo dvividhaś ca dṛṣṭas tathā dvikalpo vyavadānapakṣaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:464: ayatnato hetubalādhikas tu nirmucyate ghaṭṭitamātra eva /
GK19asvsaunu:465: yatnena tu pratyayaneyabuddhir vimokṣam āpnoti parāśrayeṇa // Saund_5.17
GK19asvsaunu:466: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatām avāpa /
GK19asvsaunu:467: yasmād imaṃ tatra cakāra yatnaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munir ujjihīrṣam //
GK19asvsaunu:468: nandas tu duḥkhena viceṣṭamānaḥ śanair agatyā gurum anvagacchat /
GK19asvsaunu:469: bhāryāmukhaṃ vīkṣaṇalolanetraṃ vicintayann ādraviśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_5.19
GK19asvsaunu:470: tato munis taṃ priyamālyahāraṃ vasantamāsena kṛtābhihāram /
GK19asvsaunu:472: dīnaṃ mahākāruṇikas tatas taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrtaṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:473: kareṇa cakdrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedam uvāca cainam //
GK19asvsaunu:474: yāvan na hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim /
GK19asvsaunu:475: sarvāsv avasthāsv iha vartamānaḥ sarvābhisāreṇa nihanti mṛtyuḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:476: sādhāraṇāt svapnanibhādasārāl lolaṃ manaḥ kāmasukhān niyaccha /
GK19asvsaunu:477: havyair ivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmair na hi tṛptir asti //
GK19asvsaunu:478: śraddhādhanaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ dhanebhyaḥ prajñārasas tṛptir rasebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:480: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:481: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kim indriyāṇām upagamya dāsyam //
GK19asvsaunu:482: tan niścitaṃ bhīklamaśugviyuktaṃ pareṣv anāyattam ahāryam anyaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:483: nityaṃ śivaṃ śāntisukhaṃ vṛṇīṣva kim indriyārthārtham anartham ūḍhvā //
GK19asvsaunu:484: jarāsamā nāsty amṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagaty anarthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:485: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyām etat trayaṃ khalv avaśena sevyam //
GK19asvsaunu:486: snehena kaś cin na samo 'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṇāsamam asti hāri /
GK19asvsaunu:487: rāgāgninā nāsti samas tathāgnis tac cet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te 'sti //
GK19asvsaunu:488: avaśyabhāvi priyaviprayogas tasmāc ca śoko niyataṃ viṣevyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:489: śokena conmādam upeyivāṃso rājarṣayo 'nye 'py avaśā viceluḥ // Saund_5.29
GK19asvsaunu:490: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmān no kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:491: mahac ca dagdhuṃ bhavakakṣajālaṃ saṃdhukṣayālpāgnim ivātmatejaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:492: yathauṣadhair hastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaś cana pannagena /
GK19asvsaunu:493: tathānapekṣo jitalokamoho na daśyate śokabhujaṅgamena // Saund_5.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:494: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsam āgacchati mṛtyukāle /
GK19asvsaunu:495: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāstro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ // Saund_5.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:496: ity evam uktaḥ sa tathāgatena sarveṣu bhūteṣv anukampakena /
GK19asvsaunu:497: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃs tatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe //
GK19asvsaunu:498: atha pramādāc ca tam ujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam /
GK19asvsaunu:499: pravrājayānanda śamāya nandam ity abravīn maitramanā maharṣiḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:500: nandaṃ tato 'ntarmanasā rudantam ehīti vaidehamunir jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:501: śanais tatas taṃ samupetya nando na pravrajiṣyāmy aham ity uvāca //
GK19asvsaunu:502: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa /
GK19asvsaunu:503: saṃśrutya tasmād api tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunir nandam uvāca bhūyaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:504: mayy agraje pravrajite 'jitātman bhrātṣṛv anupravrajiteṣu cāsmān /
GK19asvsaunu:505: jñātīṃś tasmād api tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunir nandam uvāca bhūyaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:506: rājarṣayas te viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:507: niṣṭhīvya kāmān upaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ // Saund_5.38
GK19asvsaunu:508: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma /
GK19asvsaunu:509: naivāsti moktuṃ maitrālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣor iva sopasargam // Saund_5.39
GK19asvsaunu:510: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā /
GK19asvsaunu:511: āropyamāṇasya tam eva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthād iva sārthikasya //
GK19asvsaunu:512: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayita mohān na tato vyapeyāt /
GK19asvsaunu:513: kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:514: prañīyamānaś ca yathā vadhāya matto hasec ca pralapec ca vadhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:515: mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparītacetāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:516: yadā narendrāś ca kuṭumbinaś ca vihāya badhūṃś ca parigrahāṃś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:517: yayuś ca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣv anityeṣv kuto 'nurodhaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:518: kiṃ cin na paśyāmi ratasya yatra tad anyabhāvena bhaven na duḥkham /
GK19asvsaunu:519: tasmāt kva cin na kṣamate prasktir yadi kṣamas tadvigamān na śokaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:520: tat saumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citram ivendrajālam /
GK19asvsaunu:521: priyābhidhāntaṃ tayja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matis te yadi duḥkhajālam //
GK19asvsaunu:522: varaṃ hitodarkam aniṣṭam annaṃ na svādu yat syād ahitānubaddham /
GK19asvsaunu:523: yasmād ahaṃ tvā viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye 'pi // Saund_5.46
GK19asvsaunu:524: bālasya dhārtrī vinigṛhya loṣṭaṃ yathoddharaty āsyapuṭapraviṣṭam /
GK19asvsaunu:525: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tat tvām avocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya //
GK19asvsaunu:526: aniṣṭam apy auṣadham āturāya dadāti vaidyaś ca yathā nigṛhya /
GK19asvsaunu:527: tadvan mayoktaṃ pratikūlam etat tubhyaṃ hitodarkam anugrahāya //
GK19asvsaunu:528: tad yāvad eva kṣañasaṃnipāto na mṛtyur āgacchati yāvad eva /
GK19asvsaunu:529: yāvad vayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvad eva //
GK19asvsaunu:530: ity evam uktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣinā kāruṇikena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:531: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacas te tathā yathājñāpaysīty uvāca //
GK19asvsaunu:532: ādāya vaidehamunis tatas taṃ nināya saṃśliṣya viceṣṭamānam /
GK19asvsaunu:534: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu /
GK19asvsaunu:535: vakrāgranālaṃ nalinaṃ taḍāge varṣodakalinnam ivābabhāse // Saund_5.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:536: nandas tatas tarukaṣāyaviraktavāsāś cintāvaśo navagṛhita iva dvipendraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:537: pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātpena pariṣikta ivābabhāse //
GK19asvsaunu:538: Saundaranande mahākāvye nandapravrājano nāma pañcamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:539: CANTO VI tato hṛte bhartari gauraveṇa prītau hṛtāyām aratau kṛtāyām /
GK19asvsaunu:540: tatraiva harmyopari vartamānā na sundarī saiva tadā babhāse // Saund_6.1
GK19asvsaunu:541: sā bhartur abhyāgamanapratīkṣā gavākṣam ākramya payodharābhyām /
GK19asvsaunu:542: dvāronmukhī calayoktrakā lalambe mukhena tiryaṅnatakuṇḍalena // Saund_6.2
GK19asvsaunu:543: vilambhaārā calayoktrakā sā tasmād vimānād vinatā cakāśe /
GK19asvsaunu:544: tapaḥksayād apsarasāṃ vareva cyutaṃ vimānāt priyam īkṣamāṇā // Saund_6.3
GK19asvsaunu:546: cintācalākṣeṇa mukhena tasthau bartāram anyatra viśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.4
GK19asvsaunu:548: tiryak ca śiśye pravikīrṇahārā sapādukaikārthavilambapādā // Saund_6.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:549: athātra kā cit pramadā sabāṣpāṃ tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ draṣṭum anīpsamānā /
GK19asvsaunu:550: prāsādasopānatalapraṇādaṃ cakāra padbhyāṃ sahasā rudantī // Saund_6.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:551: tasyāś ca sopānatalapraṇādaṃ śrutaiva tūrṇaṃ punar utpapāta /
GK19asvsaunu:552: prītyā prasaktaiva ca saṃjaharṣa priyopayānaṃ pariśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.7
GK19asvsaunu:554: sopānakukṣiṅ prasasāra harṣād bhraṣṭaṃ dukūlāntam acintayantī // Saund_6.8
GK19asvsaunu:555: tām aṅganāṃ prekṣya ca vipralabdhā niśvasya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ prapede /
GK19asvsaunu:556: vivarṇavaktrā na rarāja cāśu vivarṇacandreva himāgame dyauḥ // Saund_6.9
GK19asvsaunu:557: sā duḥkhitā bhartur adarśanena kāmena kopena ca dahyamānā /
GK19asvsaunu:558: kṛtvā kare vaktram upopaviṣṭā cintānadīṃ śokajalāṃ tatāra // Saund_6.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:559: tasyā mukhaṃ padmasapatnabhūtaṃ pāṇau sthitaṅ pallavarāgatāmre /
GK19asvsaunu:560: chāyāmayasyāmbhasi paṅkajasya babhau nataṃ padmam ivopariṣṭāt //
GK19asvsaunu:561: sā strīsvabhāvena vicintya tat tad dṛṣṭānurāge 'bhimukhe 'pi patyau /
GK19asvsaunu:562: dharmāśrite tattvam avindamānā saṃkalpya tat tad vilalāpa tat tat //
GK19asvsaunu:563: eṣyāmy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ tvayīti kṛtvā mayi tāṃ pratijñām /
GK19asvsaunu:564: kasmān nu hetor dayitapratijñaḥ so 'dya priya me vitathapratijñaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:566: kuto vikāro 'yam abhūtapūrvaḥ svenāparāgeṇa mamāpacārāt // Saund_6.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:567: ratipriyasya priyavartino me priyasya nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ viraktam /
GK19asvsaunu:568: tathāpi rāgo yadi tasya hi syān maccittarakṣī na sa nāgataḥ syāt //
GK19asvsaunu:569: rūpeṇa bhāvena ca madviśiṣtā priyeṇa dṛṣṭā niyataṃ tato 'nyā /
GK19asvsaunu:570: tathā hi kṛtvā mayi moghasāntvaṃ lagnāṃ satīṃ mām agamad vihāya //
GK19asvsaunu:571: bhaktiṃ sa buddhaṃ prati yām avocat tasya prayātuṃ mayi sopadeśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:572: munau prasādo yadi tasya hi syān mṛtyor ivogrād anṛtād bibhīyāt //
GK19asvsaunu:573: lekārtham ādarśanam anyacitto vibhūṣayantya mama dhārayitvā /
GK19asvsaunu:574: bibharti so 'nyasya janasya taṅ cen namo 'stu tasmai calasauhṛdāya //
GK19asvsaunu:575: necchanti yāḥ śokam avāptum evaṃ śraddhātum arhanti na tā narāṇām /
GK19asvsaunu:576: kva cānuvṛttir mayi sāsya pūrvaṃ tyāgaḥ kva cāyaṃ janavat kṣaṇena //
GK19asvsaunu:577: ity evamādi priyaviprakutā priye 'nyad āśaṅkya ca sā jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:578: saṃbhrāntam āruhya ca tad vimānaṃ tāṃ strī sabāṣpā giram ity uvāca //
GK19asvsaunu:580: yas tvāṃ priyo nābhyacarat kadā cit tam anyathā yāsyatikātarāsi //
GK19asvsaunu:581: mā svāminaṃ svāmini doṣato gāḥ priyaṃ priyārhaṃ priyakāriṇaṃ tam /
GK19asvsaunu:582: na sa tvad anyāṃ pramadām avaiti svacakravākyā iva cakravākaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:583: sa tu tvadarthaṃ gṛhavāsam īpsan jijīviṣus tvatparitoṣahetoḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:585: śrutvā tato bhartari tāṃ pravṛttiṃ savepathuḥ sā sahasotpapāta /
GK19asvsaunu:586: pragṛhya bāhū virurāva coccair hṛdīva digdhābhihatā kareṇuḥ // Saund_6.24
GK19asvsaunu:588: papāta śīrṇākulahārayaṣṭiḥ phalātibhārād iva cūtayaṣṭiḥ // Saund_6.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:589: sā padmarāgaṃ vasanaṃ vasānā padmānanā padmadalāyatākṣī /
GK19asvsaunu:590: padmā vipadmā patiteva lakṣmīḥ śuśoṣa padmasrag ivātapena // Saund_6.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:591: saṃcintya saṃcintya guṇāṃś ca bhartur dīrghaṃ niśaśavāsa tatāma caiva /
GK19asvsaunu:592: vibhūṣaśrīnihite prakoṣṭhe tāmre karāgre ca vinirdudhāva // Saund_6.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:593: na bhuṣaṇārtho mama saṃpratīti sā dikṣu cikṣepa vibhūṣaṇāni /
GK19asvsaunu:594: nirbhuṣaṇā sā patitā cakāśe viśīrṇapuṣpastabakā lateva // Saund_6.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:595: dhṛtaḥ priyeṇāyam abhūn mameti rukmatsaruṃ darpaṇam āliliṅge /
GK19asvsaunu:596: yatnāc ca vinyastatamālapattrau ruṣṭeva dhṛṣṭaṃ pramamārja gaṇḍau //
GK19asvsaunu:600: rukmāṅgapāde śayane mahārhe na śarma lebhe pariceṣṭamānā // Saund_6.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:601: saṃdṛṣya bhartuś ca vibhūṣañāni vāsāṃsi vīṇāprabhṛtiṃś ca līlāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:602: tamo viveśābhinanāda coccaiḥ paṅkāvatīrṇeva ca saṃsasāda // Saund_6.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:604: śokāgnināntardhṛdi dahyamānā vibhrāntacitteva tadā babhūva // Saund_6.33
GK19asvsaunu:605: ruroda mamlau virurāva jaglau babhrāma tasthau vilalāpa dadhyau /
GK19asvsaunu:606: cakāra roṣaṃ vicakāra mālyaṃ cakarta vaktraṃ vicakarṣa vastram //
GK19asvsaunu:607: tāṃ cārudantīṃ prasabhaṃ rudantīṃ saṃśrutya nāryaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:608: antargṛhād āruruhur vimānaṃ trāsena kiṃnarya ivādripṛṣṭham // Saund_6.35
GK19asvsaunu:609: bāṣpeṇa tāḥ klinnaviṣaṇṇavaktrā varṣeṇa padminya ivārdrapadmāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:610: sthānānurūpeṇa yathābhimānaṃ nililyire tām anu dahyamānāḥ // Saund_6.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:611: tābhir vṛtā harmyatale 'ṅganābhiś cintātanuḥ sā sutanur babhāse /
GK19asvsaunu:613: yā tatra tāsāṃ vacasopapannā mānyā ca tasyā vayasādhikā ca /
GK19asvsaunu:614: sā pṛṣṭhatas tāṃ tu samāliliṅge pramṛhya cāśrūṇi vacāṃsy uvāca //
GK19asvsaunu:615: rājarṣivadhvās tava nānurūpo dharmāśrite bhartari jātu śokaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:616: ikṣvākuvaṃśe hy abhikāṅkṣitāni dāyādyabhūtāni tapovanāni // Saund_6.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:617: prāyeṇa mokṣāya viniḥsṛtānāṃ śākyarṣabhāṇāṃ viditāḥ striyas te /
GK19asvsaunu:618: tapovanānīva gṛhāṇi yāsāṃ sādhvīvrataṃ kāmavadāsritānām // Saund_6.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:619: yady anyayā rūpaguṇādhikatvād bhartā hṛtas te kuru bāṣpamokṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:620: manasvinī rūpavatī guṇādhyā hṛdi kṣate kātra hi nāśru muñcet // Saund_6.41
GK19asvsaunu:621: athāpi kiṃ cid vyasanaṃ prapanno mā caiva tad bhūt sadṛśo 'tra bāṣpaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:622: ato viśiṣṭaṃ na hi duḥkham asti kulodgatāyāḥ patidevatāyāḥ // Saund_6.42
GK19asvsaunu:623: atha tv idānīṃ laḍitaḥ sukhena svasthaḥ phalastho vyasnāny adṛṣtvā /
GK19asvsaunu:624: vītaspṛho dharmam anuprapannaḥ kiṃ viklave rodiṣi harṣakāle // Saund_6.43
GK19asvsaunu:625: ity evam uktāpi bahuprakāraṃ snehāt tayā naiva dhṛtiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsaunu:626: athāparā tāṃ manaso 'nukūlaṃ kālopapannaṃ praṇayād uvāca // Saund_6.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:627: bravīmi satyaṃ suviniścitaṃ me prāptaṃ priyaṃ drakṣyasi śīghram eva /
GK19asvsaunu:628: tvayā vinā sthāsyati tatra nāsau sattvāṣrayaś cetanayeva hīnaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:629: aṅke 'pi lakṣmyā na sa nirvṛtaḥ syāt tvaṃ tasya pārśve yadi tatra na syāḥ
GK19asvsaunu:630: āpatsu kṛcchrāsv api cāgatāsu tvāṃ paśyatas tasya bhaven na duḥkham //
GK19asvsaunu:631: tvaṃ nirvṛtiṃ gaccha niyaccha bāṣpaṃ taptāśrumokṣāt parirakṣa cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:632: yas tasya bhāvas tvayi yaś ca rāgo na raṃsyate tvadvirahāt sa dharme //
GK19asvsaunu:633: syād atra nāsau kulasattvagoyāt kāṣāyam ādāya vihāsyatīti /
GK19asvsaunu:634: anātmanādāya gṛhonmukhasya punar vimoktuṃ ka ivāsti doṣaḥ // Saund_6.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:635: ity yuvatijanena sāntvyamānā hṛtahṛdayā ramaṇena sundarī sā /
GK19asvsaunu:636: dramiḍam abhimukhī pureva rambhā kṣitim agamat parivāritāpsarobhiḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:637: Saundaranande mahākāvye bhāryāvilāpo nāma ṣaṣṭaḥ sargah //
GK19asvsaunu:638: CANTO VII liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhran na tu cetasā tat /
GK19asvsaunu:639: bhāryāgatair eva manovitakair jehrīyamāṇo na nananda nandaḥ // Saund_7.1
GK19asvsaunu:640: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:641: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma // Saund_7.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:643: bhṛśaṃ jajṛmbhe yugadīrghabāhur dhyātvā priyāṃ cāpam ivācakarṣa //
GK19asvsaunu:644: sa pitakṣodam iva pratīcchan cūtadrumbheyas tanupuṣpavarṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:645: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:646: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya kartā pratigarvitānām /
GK19asvsaunu:647: aśokam ālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokavanāṃ śuśoca // Saund_7.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:648: priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṇguṃ niśāmya bhītām iva niṣpatantim /
GK19asvsaunu:649: sasmāra tām aśrumukhīṃ sabāṣpaḥ priyāṃ priyaṅguprasavāvadātām // Saund_7.6
GK19asvsaunu:651: saṃkalpayām āsa śikhāṃ priyāyāḥ śuklāṃśuke 'ṭṭālam apāsritāyāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:652: latāṃ praphullām atimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām /
GK19asvsaunu:653: niśāmya cintām agamat tadaivaṃ śliṣṭābhavan mām api sundarīti // Saund_7.8
GK19asvsaunu:654: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgair iva hemagarbhaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:655: kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣur ācikṣipur asya tatra // Saund_7.9
GK19asvsaunu:656: gandhaṃ vasanto 'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveṣyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:657: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na jahrur hṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:658: saṃraktakaṇṭhaiś ca vinīlakaṇṭhais tuṣṭaiḥ prahṛṣṭair api cānyapuṣṭaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:659: lelihyamānaiś ca madhu dvirepaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda //
GK19asvsaunu:661: kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tat tat // Saund_7.12
GK19asvsaunu:662: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca /
GK19asvsaunu:663: tyaktvā priyām aśrumukhīṃ tapo ye ceruś cariṣyanti caranti caiva //
GK19asvsaunu:664: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam asti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavam āyasaṃ vā /
GK19asvsaunu:665: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam etad eva mukhaṃ calśkṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam //
GK19asvsaunu:666: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāc caiva suhṛdbalāc ca /
GK19asvsaunu:667: jñānāc ca raukṣyāc ca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayas tu pāśaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:668: jñānaṃ na me tac ca śamāya yat syān na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako 'smi /
GK19asvsaunu:669: kāmātmakaś cāsmi guruś ca buddhaḥ sthito 'ntare cakragater ivāsmi //
GK19asvsaunu:670: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dvirguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:671: sarvāsv avasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogād iva cakravākaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:672: adyāpi tan me hṛdi vartate ca yad darpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā /
GK19asvsaunu:673: kṛtānṛtakrodhakam abravīn māṃ kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti śaṭhaṃ hasantī //
GK19asvsaunu:674: yathaiṣy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayīti yan mām avadac ca sāśru /
GK19asvsaunu:675: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tan me vaco 'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi // Saund_7.19
GK19asvsaunu:676: baddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣur eṣaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:677: saktaḥ kva cin nāham ivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntas tathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:678: puṃskokilānām avicintya ghoṣaṃ vasantalakṣmyām avicārya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:679: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:682: nirīkṣamāṇāya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam /
GK19asvsaunu:683: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte //
GK19asvsaunu:684: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:685: jahruḥ striyo devanṛparṣisaṃghān kasmād dhi nāsmadvidham āṣipeyuḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:686: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve maghavān ahalyām /
GK19asvsaunu:687: sattvena sargeña ca tena hīnaḥ strīnirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo 'ham //
GK19asvsaunu:688: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgas tatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:689: yām aśvabhūto 'śvavadhuṃ sametya yato 'śvinau tau janayāṃ babhūva //
GK19asvsaunu:691: bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caled ihānyaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:692: bheje śvapākīṃ munir akṣamālāṃ kāmād vaiṣṭhaś ca sa sadvariṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:693: yasyāṃ vivasvān iva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto 'sya kapiñjalādaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:694: parāśaḥ śāpaśaras taharṣiḥ kālīṃ siṣeve jhaṣagarbhayonim /
GK19asvsaunu:695: suto 'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakartā // Saund_7.29
GK19asvsaunu:696: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyañaś ca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhva /
GK19asvsaunu:697: yayā hato 'bhūc calanūpureña pādena vidyullatayeva meghaḥ // Saund_7.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:699: sārasvato yatra suto 'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā //
GK19asvsaunu:700: tathā nṛparṣer dilipasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:701: srucaṃ gṛhītvā sravad ātmatejaś cikṣepa vahnāv asito yato 'bhūt //
GK19asvsaunu:702: tathāṅgado 'ntaṃ tapaso 'pi gatvā kāmābhibhūto yamunām agacchat /
GK19asvsaunu:703: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rahītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāṃ babhūva // Saund_7.33
GK19asvsaunu:704: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane 'pi śānte 'pi ca vartamānaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:705: cacāla dhairyān munir ṛṣyaṣṛṅgaḥ śailo mahīkampa ivoccaśṛṅgaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:706: brahmarṣibhāvārtham apāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣv anāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:707: sa gādhijaś cāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda // Saund_7.35
GK19asvsaunu:708: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati stuḥilaśirā mumūrcha /
GK19asvsaunu:709: yaḥ kāmaroṣātmatayānapekṣaḥ śaśāpa tām apratigṛhyamāṇaḥ // Saund_7.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:711: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa //
GK19asvsaunu:712: naptā śaśāṅkasya yaśoguṇāṅko budhasya sūnur vibhudhaprabhāvaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:713: tathorvaśīm apsarasaṃ vicintya rājarṣir unmādam agacchad aiḍaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:714: rakto girer mūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvāc ca sa tāljaṅghaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:715: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne // Saund_7.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:717: jahnuś ca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatir bhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:718: nṛpaś ca gaṅgāvirahāj jughūrṇa gaṅgāmbhasā sāla ivāttamūlaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:719: kulapradīpaḥ pratipasya sūnuḥ śrīmattanuḥ śantanur asvatantraḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:720: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānuśocan prāptām invorvīṃ striyam urvaśīṃ tām /
GK19asvsaunu:721: sadvṛttavarmā kila somavarmā babhrāma cittodhavabhinnavarmā // Saund_7.42
GK19asvsaunu:722: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:723: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatir deva ivāttasenaḥ // Saund_7.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:724: svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihirṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:725: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmhatham utsasarje //
GK19asvsaunu:726: śaptaś ca pāṇḍur madanena nūnaṃ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:727: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpād asevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum // Saund_7.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:728: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghaḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:729: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyām apaśyan kimu viklavo 'ham //
GK19asvsaunu:730: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛham eva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam /
GK19asvsaunu:731: na hy anyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāc cyutasya //
GK19asvsaunu:732: pāṇau kapālam avadhāya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ māna nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:733: yasyoyoddhavo na dhṛtir asti na śānti asti citrapradīpa iva so 'sti ca nāsti caiva // Saund_7.48
GK19asvsaunu:734: yo niḥsṛtaś ca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyam udvahati yo na ca niṣkasāyaḥ
GK19asvsaunu:735: pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇair na ca pātrabhūto kiṅgaṃ vahann api sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ // Saund_7.49
GK19asvsaunu:736: na nyāyyam anvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktum iti yo 'pi hi me vicāraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:737: so 'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāṃs tān ye tapovanaṃ apāsya gṛhāṇy atīyuḥ // Saund_7.50
GK19asvsaunu:738: śālvādhipo hi sasuto 'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo 'ndhva eva sa ca sāṃkṛtir antidevaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:739: cīrāṇy apāsya dadhire punar aṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāṣ ca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ // Saund_7.51
GK19asvsaunu:740: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gurur ito yāvad eva prayātas tyaktvā kāṣāyaṃ gṛham aham itas tāvad eva prayāsye /
GK19asvsaunu:741: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddher nāmutrārthaḥ syād upahatamater nāpy ayaṃ jīvalokaḥ // Saund_7.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:742: Saundarananda mahākāvye nandivlāpo nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:743: CANTO VIII atha nandam adhīralocanaṃ gṛhayānotsukam utsukotuskam /
GK19asvsaunu:744: abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaś cid uvāca maitrayā // Saund_8.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:745: kim idaṃ mukham aśrudurinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:746: dhṛtim ehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaś ca śamaś ca śobhate // Saund_8.2
GK19asvsaunu:747: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:748: śrutavidhyupacārakovidā dvividhā eva tayoś cikitsakāḥ // Saund_8.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:749: tad iyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇam anūnam ucyatām /
GK19asvsaunu:750: viniguhya hi rogam āturo nacirāt tīvram anartham ṛcchati // Saund_8.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:751: atha duḥkham idaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yad atra bheṣajam /
GK19asvsaunu:752: manaso hi rajastamasvino bhiṣajo 'dhyātmavidaḥ parīkṣakāḥ // Saund_8.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:753: nikhilena ca satyam ucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyaste /
GK19asvsaunu:754: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni madākulāni ca // Saund_8.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:755: iti tena sa coditas tadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣur ātmanaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:756: avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ pravivakṣur ātmanaḥ // Saund_8.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:757: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:758: mṛdubhir mṛdumāruteritair upagūdhāv iva bālapallavaiḥ // Saund_8.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:759: sa jagāda tataś cikīṣitam ghananiśvāsagṛhītam antarā /
GK19asvsaunu:760: śrutavāgviśadāya bhikṣave viduṣā pravrajitena durvacam // Saund_8.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:761: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:762: adhṛtau yad iyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ // Saund_8.10
GK19asvsaunu:763: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi /
GK19asvsaunu:764: na hi bhāvam imaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate 'py asādhave // Saund_8.11
GK19asvsaunu:765: tad idaṃ śṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharavidhāv ṛte priyām /
GK19asvsaunu:766: girisānuṣu kāminīm ṛte kṛtaretā iva kiṃnaraś caran // Saund_8.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:767: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛham eva yena me /
GK19asvsaunu:768: na hi śarma labhe tayā vinā nṛpatir hīna ivottamaśriyā // Saund_8.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:769: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:770: śramaṇaḥ sa śiraḥ prakampayan nijagādātmagataṃ śanair idam // Saund_8.14
GK19asvsaunu:771: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:772: pravivikṣati vāgurāṃ mṛgaś capalo gītaraveṇa vañcitaḥ // Saund_8.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:773: vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:774: vicaran phalapuṣpavadvanaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svayam eva pañjaram // Saund_8.16
GK19asvsaunu:775: kalabhaḥ kariṇā khalūddhṛto bahupaṅkād viṣamān nadītalāt /
GK19asvsaunu:776: jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatī titīrṣati // Saund_8.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:777: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareña bodhitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:778: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayam ugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati // Saund_8.18
GK19asvsaunu:779: mahatā khalu jātavedasā jvalitād utpatito vanadrumāt /
GK19asvsaunu:780: punar icchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ // Saund_8.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:781: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:782: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ // Saund_8.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:783: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:784: aśanaṃ khalu vāntam ātmanā kṛpañaḥ śvā punar attum icchati // Saund_8.21
GK19asvsaunu:785: iti manmathaśokakarṣitaṃ tam anudhyāya muhur nirīkṣya ca /
GK19asvsaunu:786: śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavadvākyam uvāca vipriyam // Saund_8.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:788: upapannam alabdhacakusuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavet tava // Saund_8.23
GK19asvsaunu:790: aviṣaktamateś calātmano na hi dharme 'bhiratir vidhīyate // Saund_8.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:791: viṣayeṣu tu doṣadarśinaḥ parituṣṭasya śucer amāninaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:792: śamakarmasu yuktacetasaḥ kṛtabuddher na ratir na vidyate // Saund_8.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:793: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhen bāliśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:794: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā // Saund_8.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:796: sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatir vāyuvaśād girer iva // Saund_8.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:798: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayed doṣavate gṛhāya saḥ // Saund_8.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:799: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parmuktaḥ punar eva bandhanam /
GK19asvsaunu:800: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punar gṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam // Saund_8.29
GK19asvsaunu:801: puruṣaś ca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punar icchet kalim eva sevitum /
GK19asvsaunu:802: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliṣaḥ kalibhūtām ajitendriyaḥ priyām // Saund_8.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:803: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:804: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:805: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vītamadā bhayapradāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:806: iti doṣabhayāvahāś ca tāḥ katham arhanti niṣevanaṃ nu tāḥ // Saund_8.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:807: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhṛdaś cāpi suhṛjjanena yat /
GK19asvsaunu:808: paradoṣavikṣaṇāḥ śaṭhās tadanāryāḥ pracaranti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:809: kulajāḥ kṛpaṇībhavanti yad yad ayuktaṃ pracaranti sāhasam /
GK19asvsaunu:810: praviśanti ca yac camūmukhaṃ rabhasās tatra nimittam aṅganāḥ // Saund_8.34
GK19asvsaunu:811: vacanena haranati valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā /
GK19asvsaunu:812: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣam // Saund_8.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:813: pradahan dahano 'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano 'pi gṛhyate /
GK19asvsaunu:814: kupito bhujago 'pi gṛhyate pradānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate // Saund_8.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:815: na vapur vimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam /
GK19asvsaunu:816: praharanty aviśeṣataḥ striyaḥ sarito grāhakulākulā iva // Saund_8.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:817: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca suahṛdaṃ kva cit /
GK19asvsaunu:818: kalitā vanitaiva cañcalā tad ihāriṣv iva nāvalambyate // Saund_8.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:819: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam /
GK19asvsaunu:820: praṇateṣu bhavanti garvitāḥ pramadās tṛptatarāś ca māniṣu // Saund_8.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:821: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat /
GK19asvsaunu:822: dhanavatsu caranti tṛṣṇayā dhanahīneṣu caranty avajñayā // Saund_8.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:823: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaraty eva yathā hṛtāpi gauḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:825: praviśanty api hi striyaś citām anubhadhnanty api muktajīvtāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:826: api bibhrati naiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sāhṛdam // Saund_8.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:827: ramayanti patīn kathaṃ cana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kva cit /
GK19asvsaunu:828: calacittatayā sahasraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svan eva tāḥ // Saund_8.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:829: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī /
GK19asvsaunu:830: mṛgarājam atho bṛhadrathā pramadānām agatir na vidyate // Saund_8.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:832: munir ugratapāś ca gautamaḥ samavāpur vanitoddhataṃ rajaḥ // Saund_8.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:833: akṛtajñam anāryam asthiraṃ vanitānām ida īdṛśaṃ manaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:834: katham arhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu // Saund_8.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:835: atha sūkṣmamati dvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi /
GK19asvsaunu:836: kimu kāyam asadgṛhaṃ sravad vaintānām aśuciṃ na paśyasi // Saund_8.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:838: yad ahany ahani pradhāvanair vasanaiś cābharaṇaiś ca saṃskṛtam /
GK19asvsaunu:839: aśubhaṃ tamasāvṛtekṣaṇaḥ śubhato gacchasi nāvagacchasi // Saund_8.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:840: atha vā samavaiṣi tattanūm aśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvid asti te /
GK19asvsaunu:841: surabhiṃ vidadhāsi hi kriyām aśuces tatprabhavasya śāntaye // Saund_8.49
GK19asvsaunu:843: yadi sādhu kim atra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci // Saund_8.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:845: yadi sā tava sundarī bhaven niyataṃ te 'dya na sundarī bhavet //
GK19asvsaunu:846: sravatīm aśuciṃ spṛśec ca kaḥ saghuṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam /
GK19asvsaunu:847: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhaven makṣikapattramātrayā // Saund_8.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:848: tvacaveṣṭhitam astipañjaraṃ yadi kāyaṃ samavaiṣi yoṣitām /
GK19asvsaunu:849: madanena ca kṛṣyase balād aghṛṇaḥ kāyaṃ samvaiṣi yoṣitām // Saund_8.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:851: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām // Saund_8.54
GK19asvsaunu:852: tad avetya manaḥśarīrayor vanitā doṣavatīr viśeṣataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:853: capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām // Saund_8.55 //
GK19asvsaunu:854: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam /
GK19asvsaunu:855: upagamya yathā tathā punar na hi behttuṃ niyamaṃ tvam arhasi // Saund_8.56
GK19asvsaunu:857: nidhanam api varaṃ sthirātmanaś cyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam //
GK19asvsaunu:858: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo nindyo bhavaty apasṛtaḥ samarād rathasthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:859: bhaikṣākam abhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ nindyas tathā bhavati kāmarhṛtendriyāśvaḥ // Saund_8.58
GK19asvsaunu:860: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarasrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuś calacitramauliḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:861: vairūpyam abhyupagataḥ paraiṇḍabhojī hāsyas tathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ // Saund_8.59
GK19asvsaunu:862: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśyanīye 'pi śayito varāho nirmuktaḥ punar aśuci dhāvet paricitam
GK19asvsaunu:863: tathā śreyaḥ śṛṇvan praśamasukham āsvādya guṇavad vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛham abhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ
GK19asvsaunu:864: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśur api gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bhuvidham anarthāya bhavati tad vijñāya manaḥśarīraniyatān nāriṣu doṣān imān matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca /
GK19asvsaunu:865: dṛṣṭvā durbalam āmapatrasadṛśaṃ mṛtyūpasṛṣṭaṃ jagan nirmokṣāya kuruṣva buddhim atulām utkaṇṭhituṃ nārhasi // Saund_8.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:867: CANTO IX athaivam ukto 'pi sa tena bhiṣuṇā jagāma naivopaśamaṃ priyāṃ prati /
GK19asvsaunu:868: tathā hi tām eva tadā sa cintayan na tasya śuśrāva visaṃjñavad vacaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:869: yathā hi vaidyasya cikīrṣataḥ śivaṃ vaco na gṛhnāti mumūrṣur āturaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:870: tathaiva matto balarūpayauvanair hitaṃ na jagrādha sa tasya tadvacaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:871: na cātra citraṃ yadi rāgapāpmanā mano 'bhibhūyeta tamovṛtāmanaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:872: narasya pāpmā hi tadā nivartate yadā bhavaty antagataṃ tamas tanu //
GK19asvsaunu:873: tatas tathākṣiptam avekṣya taṃ tadā balena rūpeṇa ca yauvanena ca /
GK19asvsaunu:874: gṛhaprayāṇaṃ prati ca vyavasthitaṃ śaśāsa nandaṃ śramaṇaḥ sa śantaye //
GK19asvsaunu:875: balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca navaṃ ca yauvanaṃ tathāvagacchāmi yathāvagacchasi /
GK19asvsaunu:876: ahaṃ iv idaṃ te trayam avyavastitaṃ yathāvabuddho na tathāvabudhyase //
GK19asvsaunu:877: idaṃ hi rogāyatanaṃ jarāvaśaṃ nadītaṭānokahavac calācalam /
GK19asvsaunu:878: na vetsi dehaṃ jalaphenadurbalaṃ balasthatām ātmani yena manyase //
GK19asvsaunu:880: śarīram āsannavipatti dṛśyate bale 'bhimānas tava kena hetunā // Saund_9.7
GK19asvsaunu:882: jalaṃ śucau māsa ivārkaraśmibhiḥ kṣayaṃ vrajan kiṃ baladṛpta manyase //
GK19asvsaunu:884: ajasram ārtaṃ satatapratikriyaṃ balānvito 'smīti kathaṃ vihanyase //
GK19asvsaunu:885: yathā ghaṭaṃ mṛnmayam āmam āśrito naras titīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam /
GK19asvsaunu:886: samucchrayaṃ tadvad asāram udvahan balaṃ vyavasyed viṣayārtham udyataḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:887: śariram āmād api mṛnmayam āmam āśrito naras titīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam
GK19asvsaunu:888: citraṃ hi tiṣṭhed vidhivaddhṛto ghaṭād idaṃ nu niḥsāratmaṃ mataṃ mama //
GK19asvsaunu:889: yadāmbubhūvāyvanalāś ca dhātavaḥ sadā viruddhā viṣamā ivoragāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:890: bhavanty anarthāya śarīram āśritāḥ kathaṃ balaṃ rogavidho vyavasyasi //
GK19asvsaunu:891: prāyanti mantraiḥ praśamaṃ bhujaṅgamā na mantrasādhyās tu bhavanti dhātavaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:892: kva cic ca kiṃ cic ca daśanti pannagāḥ sadā ca sarvaṃ ca tudanti dhātavaḥ // Saund_9.13
GK19asvsaunu:893: idaṃ hi śayyāsanapānabhojanair guṇaiḥ śariraṃ ciram apy avekṣitam /
GK19asvsaunu:894: na marṣayaty ekam api vytikramaṃ yato mahāśiviṣavat prakupyati //
GK19asvsaunu:895: yadā himārto jvalanaṃ niṣevate himaṃ nidāghābhihato 'bhikāṅkṣati /
GK19asvsaunu:896: kṣudhānivto 'nnaṃ salilaṃ tṛṣānvito balaṃ kutaḥ kiṃ ca kathaṃ ca kasya ca
GK19asvsaunu:897: tad evam ajñāya śarīram āturaṃ balānvito 'smīti na mantum arhasi /
GK19asvsaunu:898: asāram asvantam aniścitaṃ jagaj jagaty anitye balam avyavasthitam //
GK19asvsaunu:899: kva kārtavīryasya balābhimāninaḥ shasrabāhor balam arjunasya tat /
GK19asvsaunu:900: cakarta bāhūn yudhi yasya bhārgavo mahānti śṛṅgāṇy aśanir girer iva //
GK19asvsaunu:901: kva tadbalaṃ kaṃsavikarṣiṇo hares turaṅgarājasya puṭāvabhedinaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:902: yam ekabāṇena nijaghinvān jarāḥ kramāgatā rūpam ivottamaṃ jarā //
GK19asvsaunu:903: diteḥ sutasyāmararoṣakāriṇaś camūrucer vā namuceḥ kva tadbalam /
GK19asvsaunu:904: yam āhave kruddham ivāntakaṃ sthitaṃ jaghāna phenāvayavena vāsavaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:905: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ kva ca tat tadābhavad yudhi jvalitvā tarasaujasā ca ye /
GK19asvsaunu:906: samitsammidhā jvalanā ivādhvare hatāsavo bhasmani paryavasthitāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:907: ato viditvā balvīryamānināṃ balānvitānām avamarditaṃ balam /
GK19asvsaunu:908: jagaj jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ vicārayan bale 'bhimānaṃ na vidhātum arhasi //
GK19asvsaunu:909: balaṃ mahad vā yadi vā na manyase kuruṣva yuddhaṃ saha tāvad indriyaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:910: jayaś ca te 'trāsti mahac ca te balaṃ parājayaś ced vitathaṃ ca te balam
GK19asvsaunu:911: tathā matā vīratarā manīṣiṇo jayanti lohāni ṣaśindriyāṇi ye // Saund_9.23
GK19asvsaunu:912: ahaṃ vapuṣmān iti yac ca manyase vicakṣaṇaṃ naitad idaṃ ca gṛhyatām /
GK19asvsaunu:913: kva tad vapuḥ sā ca vapuṣmatī tanur gadasya sāmyasya ca sāraṇasya ca //
GK19asvsaunu:914: yathā mayūraś calacitracandrako bibharti rūpaṃ guṇavat svabhāvataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:915: śarīrasaṃskāraguṇād ṛte tathā bibharṣi rūpaṃ yadi rūpavān asi //
GK19asvsaunu:916: yadi pratīpaṃ vṛṇuyān na vāsasā na śaucakāle yadi saṃspṛśed apaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:917: mṛjāviśeṣaṃ yadi nādadīta vā vapur vapuṣman vada kīdṛśaṃ bhavet //
GK19asvsaunu:918: navaṃ vayaś cātmagataṃ niśāmya yad gṛhonmukhaṃ te viṣayāptaye manaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:919: niyaccha tac chailanadīrayopamaṃ drutaṃ hi gacchaty anvirati yauvanam //
GK19asvsaunu:920: ṛtur vyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṅ prayātaḥ punar eti candramāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:921: gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam //
GK19asvsaunu:923: yadā mukhaṃ drakṣyasi jarjaraṃ tadā jarābhibhūto vimado bhaviṣyasi //
GK19asvsaunu:924: niṣevya pānaṃ madanīyam uttamaṃ niśāvivāseṣu cirād vimādyati /
GK19asvsaunu:925: naras tu matto balarūpayauvanair na kaś cid aprāpya jarāṃ vimādyati //
GK19asvsaunu:926: yathekṣur atyantarasaprapīḍito bhuvi praviddho dahanāya śuṣyate /
GK19asvsaunu:927: tathā jarāyantraniīḍitā tanur nipītasārā maraṇāya tiṣṭhati // Saund_9.31
GK19asvsaunu:928: yathā hi nṛbhyāṃ karapattram īritaṃ samucchritaṃ dāru bhinatty anekadhā /
GK19asvsaunu:929: tathocchritāṃ pātayati prajām imām aharniśābhyām upasaṃhitā jarā //
GK19asvsaunu:930: smṛteḥ pramoṣo vapuṣaḥ parābhavo rateḥ kṣayo vācchruticakṣuṣāṃ grahaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:931: śramasya yonir balvīryayor vadho jarāsamo nāsti śarīriṇāṃ ripuḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:932: idaṃ viditvā nidhanasya daiśikaṃ jarābhidahānaṃ jagato mahadbhayam /
GK19asvsaunu:933: ahaṃ vapuṣmān balavān yuveti vā na mānam āroḍhum anāryam arhasi //
GK19asvsaunu:934: ahaṃ mamety eva ca raktacetasāṃ śarīrasaṃjñā tava yaḥ kalau grahaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:935: tam utsṛjaivaṃ yadi śāmyatā bhaved bhayaṃ hy ahaṃ ceti mameti cārchati //
GK19asvsaunu:936: yadā śarīre na vaśo 'sti kasya cin nirasyamāne vividhair upaplavaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:937: kathaṃ kṣamaṃ vettum ahaṃ mameti vā śarīrasaṃjñaṃ gṛham āpadām idam //
GK19asvsaunu:938: sapannage yaḥ kugṛhe sadāśucau rameta nityaṃ pratisaṃskṛte 'bale /
GK19asvsaunu:939: sa duṣṭadhātāv aśucau calācale rameta kāye viparītdarśanaḥ // Saund_9.37
GK19asvsaunu:940: yathā prarohanti tṛṇāny ayatnataḥ kṣitau prayatnāt tu bhavnti śālayaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:941: tathaiva duḥkhāni tṛñāny ayatnataḥ kṣitau pryatnāt tu bhavanti vā na vā //
GK19asvsaunu:942: śarīram ārtaṃ parikarṣataś calaṃ na cāsti kiṃ cit paramārthataḥ sukham /
GK19asvsaunu:943: sukhaṃ hi duḥkhapratikārasevayā sthite ca duḥkhe tanuni vyasvasyati //
GK19asvsaunu:944: yathānapekṣyāgryam apīsitaṃ sukhaṃ prabādhate duḥkham upetam aṇv api /
GK19asvsaunu:945: tathānapekṣyātmani duḥkham āgataṃ na vidyate kiṃ cana kasya cit sukham //
GK19asvsaunu:946: śarīram īdṛgbhahuduḥkham adhruvaṃ phalānurodhāh atha nāvagacchasi /
GK19asvsaunu:947: dravat phalebhyo dhṛtiraśmibhir mano nigṛhyatāṃ gaur iva śasyalālasā //
GK19asvsaunu:948: na kāmabhogā hi bhavanti tṛptaye havīṃṣi dīptasya vibhāvasor iva /
GK19asvsaunu:949: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu vardhate //
GK19asvsaunu:950: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanān naiva śamaṃ nigacchati /
GK19asvsaunu:951: tathendriyārtheṣv ajitendriyaś caran na kāmabhogair upaśāntim ṛcchati //
GK19asvsaunu:952: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogān na bhajeta tatkṣamam /
GK19asvsaunu:953: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā //
GK19asvsaunu:954: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā /
GK19asvsaunu:955: anarthamūlā viṣayāś ca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ // Saund_9.46
GK19asvsaunu:956: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratām /
GK19asvsaunu:957: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasya cic chivāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:958: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kiṃpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye /
GK19asvsaunu:959: niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāś calātmano bhavanty anarthāya tathā na bhūtaye //
GK19asvsaunu:960: tat etad ājñāya vipāpmanātmanā vimokṣadharmādyupasaṃhitaṃ hitam /
GK19asvsaunu:961: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayam udgiran giram //

GK19asvsaunu:1200: etāny ādau nimittāni cyutau svargād divaukasām /

GK19asvsaunu:1655: suvarṇahetor api pāṃsudhāvako vihāya pāṃsūn bṛhato yathāditaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1657: vimokṣahetor api yuktamānaso vihāya doṣā bṛhatas tathāditaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1660: tathā yogācāro nipuñam iha doṣavyavahitaṃ viśodhya kleśebhyaḥ śamayati manaḥ saṃkṣipati ca yathā ca svacchandād upanayati karmāśrayasukhaṃ suvarṇaṃ karmāro bahuṃvidham alaṅkāravidhiṣu
GK19asvsaunu:1661: manaḥśuddho bhikṣur vaśagatam abhijñāsv api tathā yathecchaṃ yatrecchaṃ śamayati manaḥ prerayati ca // Saund_15.69 //
GK19asvsaunu:1662: Saundaranande mahākāvye vitarkaprahāṇo nāma pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1663: CANTO XVI evaṃ manodhāraṇayā krameṇa vyapohya kiṃ cit samupohya kiṃ cit /
GK19asvsaunu:1664: dhyānāni catvāry adhigamya yogī prāpnoty abhijñā niyamena pañca //
GK19asvsaunu:1665: ṛddhipravekaṃ ca bahuprakāraṃ parasya cetaś caritāvabodham /
GK19asvsaunu:1666: atītajanmasmaraṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ divye viśuddhe śruticakṣuṣī ca // Saund_16.2
GK19asvsaunu:1668: tato hi duḥkhaprabhṛtīni samyak catvāri satyāni padāny avaiti //
GK19asvsaunu:1669: bādhātmakaṃ duḥkham idaṃ prasaktaṃ duḥkhasya hetuḥ prabhavātmako 'yam /
GK19asvsaunu:1671: ity āryasaryāny avabudhya buddhyā catvāri samyak pratividhya caiva /
GK19asvsaunu:1672: sarvāsravān bhāvanayābhibhūya na jāyate śāntim avāpya bhūyaḥ // Saund_16.5
GK19asvsaunu:1673: abodhato hy aprativedhataś ca tattvātmakasyāsya catuṣṭayasya /
GK19asvsaunu:1674: bhāvad bhavaṃ yāti na śāntim eti saṃsāradolām adhiruhya lokaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1675: tasmāj jarāder vyasanasya mūlaṃ samāsato duḥkham avaihi janma /
GK19asvsaunu:1676: sarvauṣadhīnām iva bhūr bhavāya sarvāpadāṃ kṣetram idaṃ hi janma //
GK19asvsaunu:1677: yaj janma rūpasya hi sendriyasya duḥkhasya tan naikavidhasya janma /
GK19asvsaunu:1678: yaḥ saṃbhavaś cāsya samucchrayasya mṛtyoṣ ca rogasya ca saṃbhavaḥ saḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1679: sad vāpy asad vā viṣamiṣram annaṃ yathā vināśāya na dhāraṇāya /
GK19asvsaunu:1680: loke tathā tiryag uparyadho vā duḥkhāya sarvaṃ na sukḥāya janma //
GK19asvsaunu:1681: jarādayo naikavidhā parajānāṃ satyāṃ pravṛttau prabhavanty anarthāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1682: pravātsu ghoeṣv api māruteṣu na hy aprasūtās taravaś calanti //
GK19asvsaunu:1683: ākāsayoniḥ pavano yathā hi yathā śamīgarbhaśayo hutāśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1684: āpo yathāntarvasudhāśayāś ca duḥkhaṃ tathā cittaśarīrayoni // Saund_16.11
GK19asvsaunu:1685: apāṃ dravatvaṃ kaṭhinatvam urvyā vāyoś calatvaṃ dhruvam auṣṇyam agneḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1687: kāye sati vyādhijarādi duḥkhaṃ kṣuttarṣavarṣoṣṇahimādi caiva /

GK19asvsaunu:1689: pratyakṣam ālokya ca janmaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītam apīti viddhi /

GK19asvsaunu:1691: bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathānumeyaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1693: tan nāmarūpasya guṇānurūpaṃ yatraiva nirvṛtti udāravṛtta /
GK19asvsaunu:1694: tatraiva duḥkhaṃ na hi tadvimuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyaty abhavad bhaved vā //
GK19asvsaunu:1695: pravṛttiduḥkhasya ca tasya loke tṛṣṇādayo doṣagaṇā nimittam /
GK19asvsaunu:1696: naiveṣvaro na prakṛtir na kālo nāpi svabhāvo na vidhir yadṛcchā //
GK19asvsaunu:1697: jñātavyam etena ca kāraṇena lokasya doṣebhya iti pravṛttiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1698: yasmān mriyante sarajastamaskā na jāyate vītarajastmaskaḥ // Saund_16.18
GK19asvsaunu:1699: icchāviṣeśe sati tatra tatra yānāsanāder bhavati prayogaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1700: yasmād atas tarṣavaśat tathaiva janma prajānām iti veditavyam //
GK19asvsaunu:1701: sattvāny abhiṣvaṅgavaśāni dṛṣṭvā svajātiṣu prītiparāṇy atīva /
GK19asvsaunu:1702: abhyāsayogād upapāditāni tair eva doṣair iti tāni viddhi // Saund_16.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:1703: krodhapraharṣādibhir āśrayāṇām utpadyate ceha yathā viśeṣaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1705: doṣādhike janmani tīvradoṣa utpadyate rāgiṇi tīvrarāgaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1707: phalaṃ hi yādṛk samavaiti sākṣāt tadāgamād bījam avaity atītam /

GK19asvsaunu:1709: doṣakṣayo jātiṣu yāsu yasya vairāgyatas tāsu na jāyate saḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1713: duḥkhakṣayo hetuparikṣayāc ca śāntanaṃ śivaṃ sākṣikuruṣva dharmam /
GK19asvsaunu:1714: tṛṣṇāvirāgaṃ layanaṃ nirdohaṃ sanātanaṃ trāṇam ahāryam āryam //
GK19asvsaunu:1715: yasmin na jātir na jarā na mṛtyur na vyādhayo nāpriyasaṃprayogaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1716: necchāvipanna priyaviprayogaḥ kṣemaṃ padaṃ naiṣṭhikam acyutaṃ tat //
GK19asvsaunu:1717: dīpo yathā nirvṛtim abhyupeto naivāvaniṃ gacchati nānatarikṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:1718: diśaṃ na kāṃ cid vidiṣaṃ na kāṃ cit snehakṣayāt kevalam eti śāntim //
GK19asvsaunu:1719: evaṃ kṛtī nirvṛtim abhyupeto naivāvaniṃ gacchati nāntarikṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:1720: diśaṃ na kāṃ cid vidiśaṃ na kāṃ cit kleśakṣayāt kevalam eti sāntim //
GK19asvsaunu:1722: sa bhāvanīyo vidhivad budhena śīle śucau tripamukhe sthitena //
GK19asvsaunu:1723: vākkarma samyak sahakāyakarma yathāvad ājīvanayaś ca śuddhaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1724: idaṃ trayaṃ vṛttavidhau pravṛttaṃ śīlāśrayaṃ karmaparigrahāya //
GK19asvsaunu:1725: satyeṣu duḥkhādiṣu dṛṣṭir āryā samyagvitarkaś ca parākramaś ca /

GK19asvsaunu:1727: nyāyena satyādhigamāya yuktā samyak smṛtiḥ samyag atho samādhiḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1729: kleśāṅkurān na pratanoti śīlaṃ bījāṅkurān kāla ivāvṛttaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1733: prajñā tv aśeṣeṇa nihanti doṣāṃs tīradrumān prāvṛṣi nimnageva /

GK19asvsaunu:1743: tad vyādhisaṃjñāṃ kuru duḥkhasatye doṣeṣv api vyādhinidānasaṃjñām /

GK19asvsaunu:1745: tasmāt pravṛttiṃ parigaccha duḥkhaṃ pravartakān apy avagaccha doṣān /

GK19asvsaunu:1747: śirasy atho vāsasi saṃpradīpte satyāvabodhāya matir vicāryā /

GK19asvsaunu:1749: yadaiva yaḥ paśyati nāmarūpaṃ kṣayīti taddarśanam asya samyak /

GK19asvsaunu:1751: tayoś ca nandīrajasoḥ kṣayeṇa samyag vimuktaṃ pravadāmi cetaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:1753: yathāsvabhāvena hi nāmarūpaṃ tad dhetum evāstagamaṃ ca tasya /

GK19asvsaunu:1755: tasmāt paraṃ saumya vidhāya vīryaṃ śīghraṃ ghaṭasv āsravasaṃkṣayāya /

GK19asvsaunu:1758: avaiti yo nānyam avaiti tebhyaḥ so 'tyantikaṃ mokṣam avaiti tebhyaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1759: kleśaprahāṇāya ca niścitena kālo 'bhyupāyaś ca parīkṣitavyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1760: yogo 'py akāle hy anupāyataś ca bhavaty anarthāya na tadguṇāya //
GK19asvsaunu:1761: ajātavatsāṃ yadi gāṃ duhīta naivāptuyāt kṣīram akāladohī /
GK19asvsaunu:1762: kāle 'pi vā syān na payo labheta mohena śṛṅgād yadi gāṃ duhīta //
GK19asvsaunu:1763: ārdrāc ca kāṣṭhā jvalanābhikāmo naiva prayatnād api vahnim ṛcchet /
GK19asvsaunu:1764: kāṣṭhāc ca śuṣkād api pātganena naivāgnim āpnoty anupāapūrvam //
GK19asvsaunu:1765: tad deśakālau vidhivat parīkṣya yogasya mātrām api cābhyupāyam /
GK19asvsaunu:1766: balābale cātmani saṃpradhārya kāryāḥ prayatno na tu tadviruddhaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1767: pragrāhakaṃ yat tu nimittam uktam uddanyamāne hṛdi tan na sevyam /
GK19asvsaunu:1768: evaṃ hi cittaṃ praśamaṃ na yāti [na vahri] nā vahnir iveryamāṇaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1769: śamāya yat syān niyataṃ nimittaṃ jātoddhave cetasi tasya kālaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1770: evaṃ hi cittaṃ praśamaṃ niyacchet pradīpyamāno 'gnir ivodakena //
GK19asvsaunu:1771: śamāvahaṃ yan niyataṃ nimittaṃ sevyaṃ na tac cetasi līyamāne /
GK19asvsaunu:1772: evaṃ hi bhūyo layameti cittam anīryamāṇo 'gnir ivālpasāraḥ // Saund_16.55
GK19asvsaunu:1773: pragrāhakaṃ yan niyataṃ nimittaṃ layaṃ gate cetasi tasya kālaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1774: kriyāsamarthaṃ hi manas tathā syān mandāyamāno 'gnir ivendhanena //
GK19asvsaunu:1775: aupekṣikaṃ nāpi nimittam iṣṭaṃ layaṃ gate cetasi soddhave vā /
GK19asvsaunu:1776: evaṃ hi tīvraṃ janayed anartham upekṣito vyādhir ivāturasya // Saund_16.57
GK19asvsaunu:1777: yat syād upekṣāniyataṃ nimittaṃ sāmyaṃ gate cetasi tasya kālaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1778: evaṃ hi kṛtyāya bhavet prayogo ratho vidheyāśva iva prayātaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1780: rāgātmako muhyati maitrayā hi senhaṃ kaphakṣobha ivopayujya // Saund_16.59
GK19asvsaunu:1781: rāgoddhate cetasi dhairyam etya niṣevitavyaṃ tv aśubhaṃ nimittam /

GK19asvsaunu:1783: vyāpādadoṣeṇa manasy udīrṇe na sevitavyaṃ tv aśubhaṃ nimittam /

GK19asvsaunu:1785: vyāpādadoṣakṣubhite tu citte sevyā avapakṣopanayena maitrī /

GK19asvsaunu:1787: mohānubaddhe manasaḥ pracāre maitrāśubhā caiva bhavaty ayogaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1788: tābhyāṃ hi saṃmoham upaiti bhūyo vāyvātmako rūkṣam ivopanīya //
GK19asvsaunu:1789: mohātmaikāyāṃ mansaḥ pravṛttau sevyas tv idaṃ pratyayatāvihāraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1790: mūḍhe manasy eṣa hi śāntimārgo vāyvātmake snigdha ivopacāraḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1791: ulkāmukhastaṃ hi yathā suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāro dhamatīha kāle /
GK19asvsaunu:1792: kāle pariprokṣayate jalena krameṇa kāle samupekṣate ca // Saund_16.65 //
GK19asvsaunu:1793: dahet suvarṇaṃ hi dhamann akāle jale kṣipan saṃśamayed akāle /

GK19asvsaunu:1795: saṃpragrahasya praśamasya caiva tathaiva kāle samupekṣaṇasya /
GK19asvsaunu:1796: samyaṅnimittaṃ manasā tv avekṣyaṃ nāśo hi yatno 'py anupāyapūrvaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1797: ity evam anyāyanivartanaṃ ca nyāyaṃ ca tasmai sugato babhāṣe /
GK19asvsaunu:1798: bhūyaś ca tat tac caritaṃ viditvā vitarkahānāya vidhīn uvāca //
GK19asvsaunu:1799: yathā bhiṣak pittakaphānilānāṃ ya eva kopaṃ samupaiti doṣaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1800: śamāya tasyaiva vidhatte vyadhatta doṣeṣu tathairva buddhaḥ // Saund_16.69
GK19asvsaunu:1801: ekena kalpena sacen na hanyāt svabhyastabhāvād aśubhān vitarkān /
GK19asvsaunu:1802: tato dvitīyaṃ kramam ārabheta na tv eva heyo guṇavān prayogaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1804: samyakprayogasya ca duṣkaratvāc chettuṃ na śakyāḥ sahasā hi doṣāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:1805: añvyā yathāṇyā vipulāṇir anyā nirvāhyate tadviduṣā nareṇa /
GK19asvsaunu:1806: tadvad tad evākuśalaṃ nimittaṃ kṣipen nimittāntarasevanena // Saund_16.72
GK19asvsaunu:1808: heyaḥ sa taddoṣaparīkṣaṇena saśvāpado mārga ivādhvagena // Saund_16.73 //

GK19asvsaunu:2015: athātmanaḥ śiṣyaguṇasya caiva mahāmuneḥ śāstṛguṇasya caiva /

GK19asvsaunu:2018: tvadvākyasaṃdaṃśamukhena me sa samuddhṛtaḥ śalyahṛteva śalyaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:2019: kathaṅkathābhāvagato 'smi yena chinnaḥ sa niḥsaṃśaya saṃśayo me /

GK19asvsaunu:2021: yat pītam āsvādavaśendriyeṇa darpeṇa kandarpaviṣaṃ mayāsīt /

GK19asvsaunu:2023: kṣayaṃ gataṃ janma nirastajanman saddharmacaryām uṣito 'smi samyak /

GK19asvsaunu:2029: anye 'pi santo vimumukṣavo hi śrutva vimokṣāya nayaṃ parasya /

GK19asvsaunu:2031: urvyādikān janmani vedmi dhātūn nātmānam urvyādiṣu teṣu kiṃ cit /

GK19asvsaunu:2033: skandhāṃś ca rūpaprabhṛtīn daśārdhān paśyāmi yasmāc capalān asārān /

GK19asvsaunu:2040: amūrchitaś cāgrathitaś ca tatra tribhyo vimukto 'smi tato bhavebhyaḥ //

GK19asvsaunu:2045: tataḥ pramādāt prasṛtasya pūrvaṃ śrutvā dhṛtiṃ vyākaraṇaṃ ca tasya /

GK19asvsaunu:2047: uttiṣṭha dharme sthita śiṣyajuṣṭe kiṃ pādayor me patito 'si mūrdhnā /

GK19asvsaunu:2049: adyāsi supravrajito jitātmann aiśvaryam apy ātmani yena labdham /

GK19asvsaunu:2051: adyāsi śaucena pareṇa yukto vākkāyacetāṃsi śucīni yat te /

GK19asvsaunu:2053: adyārthavat te śrutavac chrutaṃ tac chrutānurūpaṃ pratipadya dharmam /
GK19asvsaunu:2054: kṛtaśruto vipratipadyamāno nindyo hi nirvīrya ivāttaśastraḥ // Saund_18.25
GK19asvsaunu:2055: aho dhṛtis te 'viṣayātmakasya yat tvaṃ matiṃ mokṣavidhāv akārṣīḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2056: yāsyāmi niṣṭhām iti bāliśo hi janmakṣayāt trāsam ihābhyupaiti //
GK19asvsaunu:2057: diṣṭyā durāpaḥ kṣaṇasaṃnipāto nāyaṃ kṛto mohavaśena moghaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2058: udeti duḥkhena gato hy adhastāt kūrmo yugacchidra ivārñavasthaḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:2059: nirjitya māraṃ yudhi durnivāram adyāsi loke raṇaśīrṣūraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2060: śūro 'py āsūraḥ sa hi veditavyo doṣair amitrair iva hanyate yaḥ //

GK19asvsaunu:2065: adyāpadeṣṭuṃ tava yuktarūpaṃ śuddhodhano me nṛpatiḥ piteti /

GK19asvsaunu:2069: āraṇyakaṃ kbhaikṣacaraṃ vinītaṃ dkraṣyāmi nandaṃ nibhṛtaṃ kadeti /

GK19asvsaunu:2071: bhavaty arūpo 'pi hi darśanīyaḥ svalaṅkṛtaḥ śreṣṭhatamair guṇaiḥ svaiḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:2093: aho 'ndhavijñānanimīlitaṃ jagat paṭāntare paśyati nottamaṃ sukham /

GK19asvsaunu:2099: mayā na śakyaṃ pratikartum adya kiṃ gurau hitaiṣiṇy anukampake tvayi /
GK19asvsaunu:2100: samuddhṛto yena bhavārṇavād ahaṃ mahārṇavāc cūrṇitanaur ivormibhiḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:2101: tato munis tasya niśamya hetumat prahīṇasarvāsravasūcakaṃ vacaḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:2104: atītya kāntāram avāptasādhanaḥ sudaiśikasyeva kṛtaṃ mahāvaṇik //

GK19asvsaunu:2110: avāptakāryo 'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te 'sti kiṃ cit karaṇīyam aṇv api /

GK19asvsaunu:2116: vihāya tasmād iha kāryam ātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryam apy atho /

GK19asvsaunu:2118: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janas tvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ /

GK19asvsaunu:2120: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayair manorathaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2121: vadhūr gṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ //
GK19asvsaunu:2122: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā /
GK19asvsaunu:2123: manasi śamadamātmaike vivikte matir iva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya //
GK19asvsaunu:2124: ity arhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāstur mūrdhnā vacaś ca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā /
GK19asvsaunu:2125: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvān muneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva // Saund_18.61
GK19asvsaunu:2126: bhikṣarthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīr janasyākṣipan lābhālābhasukhāsukhādiṣu samaḥ svasthendriyo niḥspṛhaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2127: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine naivonmārgagatān parān paribhavan nātmānam utkarṣayan // Saund_18.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:2128: ity eṣā vyupaśāntaye na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ śrotṝṇāṃ grahaṇārtham anyamanasāṃ kāvyopacārāt kṛtā /
GK19asvsaunu:2129: yan mokṣāt kṛtam anyad atra hi mayā tat kāvyadharmāt kṛtaṃ pātuṃ tiktam ivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syād iti // Saund_18.63 //
GK19asvsaunu:2130: prāyeṇālokya lokaṃ viṣayaratiparaṃ mo kṣāt pratihataṃ kāvyavājena tattvaṃ kathitam iha mayā mokṣaḥ param iti /
GK19asvsaunu:2131: tad buddhvā śāmikaṃ yat tad avahitam ito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ pāṃsubhyo dhātujebhyo niyatam upakaraṃ cāmīkaram iti // Saund_18.64 //
GK19asvsaunu:2133: āryasuvarṇākṣīputrasya sāketakasya bhikṣor ācāryabhadantāśvaghoṣasya mahākaver mahāvādinaḥ kṛtir iyam //
